changeSet.createView: SELECT DS.ID, DC.NAME, DC.UPLOADPATH FILELOCATION, DS.FILENAME, DS.ENDTIME, DS.STATUS, DC.id AS CONFIGID, DC.POSTEVENT, DS.VALUEDATE, DS.USERID, TH.STARTDATE, TH.ENDDATE FROM DATA_ENGINE_CONFIG DC INNER JOIN DATA_ENGINE_STATUS DS ON DS.NAME = DC.NAME LEFT join TRIAL_BALANCE_HEADER TH on TH.FILENAME=DS.FILENAME
